original_text: God will think about you in the same way that you think about other people. He will use the same rules for you as you use for other people.
korean_text: 너희가 비판하는 그 비판으로 너희가 비판을 받을 것이요 너희가 헤아리는 그 헤아림으로 너희가 헤아림을 받을 것이니라

sentences.original_text: that you think about other people
He will use the same rules for you
sentences.korean_translation: 그분은 당신에게 똑같은 규칙을 적용하실 것입니다

sentences.original_text: as you use for other people
sentences.korean_translation: 당신이 다른 사람들에게 사용하는 것과 같은
